{{Infobox Oak Item
|name       = Cell Battery
|image      = [[File:Bag_Cell_Battery_Sprite.png]]
|caption    = Artwork of the ''Cell Battery''.
|dex = 90
|effect     = More Passive Mining Energy Regen
}}

The '''Cell Battery''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it increases the amount [[Underground|Mining Energy]] passively gained. The Cell Battery is unlocked after catching 90 unique Pok√©mon.

== Details ==

|-

|-
|3 || x1.8 Energy Regen Amount || 125 Mined Items || style="text-align:right" | 500,000 {{pdollar}}
|-
|4 || x1.9 Energy Regen Amount || 250 Mined Items || style="text-align:right" | 1,000,000 {{pdollar}}
|-

|-
|}
